card.game
Class PokerGame

java.lang.Object
  card.game.CardGame
      card.game.PokerGame

public class PokerGame
extends CardGame

PokerGame is a subclass of CardGame.

This is five card poker with no draw and no betting as you go straight to "showdown."

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize(boolean shuffle)
Description copied from class: CardGame
This method represents the initialization needed for a card game. For a random game "shuffle" should be true.

Specified by:
initialize in class CardGame
Parameters:
shuffle - - false means don't shuffle the deck before the deal. true means shuffle (randomize) the deck before the deal.
